pr_title: Added committed offsets in KafkaTopicPartitionTracker and diag endpoint response

timeline.message: Passing Kafka headers to downstream systems in KafkaConnectorTask
Added committed offsets in KafkaTopicPartitionTracker and diag endpoint response

timeline.bodyText: I was considering adding a separate ConsumerOffsets class to hold both consumed offset and committed offset and use that in the nested dictionary. But synchronizing the writes to the nested dictionaries was a not easy. onPartitionsPolled and onOffsetsCommitted calls would hold locks on the dictionaries and it would make this code bug prone and non-efficient. So I thought it would be better for the client-side to merge these dictionaries (if necessary for presentation purposes).
